com.hazelcast.internal.networking

Interface ChannelInitializer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MemberChannelInitializer

    public interface ChannelInitializer
    Initializes the Channel when the Channel is used for the first time.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InitResult<ChannelInboundHandler> initInbound(Channel channel)
      Called when the Channel receives the first data.
      InitResult<ChannelOutboundHandler> initOutbound(Channel channel)
      Called when the Channel writes the first data.

    • Method Detail

      • initInbound

        InitResult<ChannelInboundHandler> initInbound(Channel channel)
                                       throws IOException
        Called when the Channel receives the first data. For the given channel, there will only be a single thread calling this method. But it could be that it is called concurrently for the same channel with initOutbound(Channel).
        Parameters:
        channel - the Channel that requires initialization
        Returns:
        the result of the initialization. Returned value could be null if not enough data is available to determine how to init (e.g. protocol info lacking). This will probably change once the TLS integration is done through the pipeline.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • initOutbound

        InitResult<ChannelOutboundHandler> initOutbound(Channel channel)
        Called when the Channel writes the first data. For the given channel, there will only be a single thread calling this method. But it could be that it is called concurrently for the same channel with initInbound(Channel).
        Parameters:
        channel - the Channel that requires initialization
        Returns:
        the result of the initialization.
